Test Name: T-Cell Receptor Beta (TCR Beta F1) Immunostain
Purpose: To detect T-cell receptor beta expression in FFPE tissue sections via immunohistochemistry, ensuring consistent and accurate technical processing.
Container: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue block or positively charged glass slide
Equipment: Automated or manual immunostaining system, microtome, antigen-retrieval device, microscope
